amendment.description: To increase the budgetary totals for the Department of Commerce to provide additional trade enforcement capability and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 614 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 614 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S3673-3677; text: CR S 3674) To increase the budgetary totals for the Department of Commerce to provide additional trade enforcement capability and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 614 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 614 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Graham.
